Azzam Alsudais

Azzam.Alsudais@Colorado.edu

I am a Computer Science PhD student (since 2016) at the University of Colorado Boulder. I work with my advisor Eric Keller in the Networking and Security Research Group (NSR). My research spans the areas of Software-defined Networking (SDN), Network Function Virtualization (NFV), and distributed, cloud, and networked systems in general. I interned at AT&T Labs Research during the summer of 2017, and have been working closely with them since then.
